song.title: Mendelian Miscarriage
song.info:
(c) 1996 Chuck Biscuits / kosmic
oi! lookie here! cb babble.mode.on
welp, here's a bit of trance for those of you into the deep german tip. hope it gets some butts movin at your place - this should be reproduced in sparkling studio quality soon and pressed onto sexy little slabs of black vinyl (dj'ing being the art of the future, of course :)
and remember - syncopation increases your funkiness factor :)
wow kids,i did something NEW and that i've NEVER DONE BEFORE in this track
for those interested in any other work i'm doing, i know i've been quite quiet release wise lately, that's because there's been alot of un-musical stuff going on which i've had to deal with and also because i've been tracking and not releasing; like the naughty devil i long to be.
nevertheless, there might be a few more of these little ditties coming your way from my brain soon, including (yet more) deep trance and some other styles i've yet to encroach upon (up till now, err, then)..
big chemical hellos to Ozone for the DAT work; much appreciated and the tape has served its purpose and others which i would never have dreamed of; big big thanks :)
make sure you stop in at the -REAL MUSIC- section of your local record outlet today!
respects to: kazu kimura, vivid (more co-ops yes definately :), basehead, injekted (phatness trackerised), sybaris (superb work), subhuman (goa demon :), and anyone who goes out for the music and not just the fringe benefits <smile>.
tap! tap! <clink> wake up <tap>
argh insurance company collection demons chasing after me! no! save me from the mercantile assailant! arrrgh!
i always expected the bad guys would be coloured red or green or something - instead they're just like me, only with expensive mobile phones
